A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible direction and story telling make this a hard film to sit through. The plot(s) felt bolted on in post production with the film lacking any sort of flow or continuity. Entire plot mechanisms fail to feel weighty enough to justify the characters' reactions and most of those characters (outside of Luke\, Kylo\, and Rey) contribute absolutely nothing anyways. First Star Wars film in the franchise to make me not look forward to the next movie.
